item.title: Native Android text sharing in Unity
item.description: This particular script will help you to implement native Android text sharing in Unity. This uses all the native class of Android in Unity using AndroidJavaClass and AndroidJavaObject and performs the Android's ACTION_SEND in Unity. For further explaination on how this works, please read the article Native Android text sharing in Unity app.
